attributes.additional_details:
We drink from plastic bottles, we buy food wrapped in plastic and chances are we even carry it home in a plastic bag.

Students at Brunel University wants to make sure we do what we can to help reduce waste from single-use plastic. With more water fountains and bottle refill points installed all over campus we don't have to buy new bottles all the time.

Don’t bottle your chance to help save our planet, sign the petition now!
attributes.background:
The Mayor of London has announced a network of drinking fountains and bottle-refill points to be rolled out across London this year as part of a plan to reduce the amount of waste created by single-use plastic. 

Brunel should follow the Mayor's lead and install fountains all over campus.

rejection.details: This is the responsibility of Brunel University, not the UK Government or Parliament.
